name: Jigsaw Tussle
description:
Chrome recommended for best performance. If you just get a black window, reload the page (this is a known issue).

Some spatial reasoning puzzle game. Join a piece to each light to win.

All levels are unlocked, in case it's too hard. Finish whichever ones you want. #1-4 are tutorial, #5-6 are pretty easy, #7-9 medium, #10-11 are a little more challenging but still not too bad. Free play mode is just for fun/practice, not intended to be beaten.

  • WASD or arrows: move
  • Up or Tab: cycle through selected piece.
  • Hold down: crouch.
  • Left/right while crouching: tilt.
  • Space or enter: join pieces.
  • Backspace: undo.
  • Esc: quit back to menu.
  • F1 within level: disable dynamic background (better performance)

Music by Kevin MacLeod, incompetech.com. Tracks used: Tech Live and Voltaic. Sound effects by Chiptone. Code is plain JavaScript using my own library.
